忩字的基本解释

忩
cōng
古同“匆”。

忩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cōng］
［《廣韻》倉紅切，平東，清。］
(1)同“怱”。急遽。参见“忩忙”、“忩忩”。
(2)见“忩忩”。

忩字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　忩； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页377第26
與悤同。【晉書·衞恆傳】下筆必爲楷，則號忩忩不暇草書。【吳志·孫和傳】無事忩忩。餘詳後匆字註。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cōng］
["Guangyun" Canghongqie, Pingdong, Qing. ]
(1) Same as "Hurry". Anxious. See "busy son-in-law", "son-in-law".
(2) See "son-in-law".
Son-in-law
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　忩; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 377 26
Same as 悤. [Jin Shu·Wei Heng Biography] The pen must be written in regular script, and the son-in-law cannot have cursive script. [Wu Zhi·Sun He Biography] Nothing happened to my son-in-law. After I have detailed the word hurriedly note.
